attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Not to remove the tax deduction on child care vouchers ,in order to give money to people who in my opinion do not deserve a single penny more than they already get. I work my *** off all week not earning a fortune and one of the few perks i get is tax relief on child care , so exactly why the **** should i further bankroll a bunch of lazy bone idle ******** to sit at home and get paid for doing **** all. I contribute to national insurance they dont and have absolutley no intention of ever doing so . Oh and by the way before any bleeding heart liberal / socialists start whining, i spent 13 years working in one of the North of Englands largest council estates where we were up to 3 generations of lazy ***** who thought the state owed them a living . This money if given to them will be spent on drugs , alcohol or tabacco not on the children not ever.You live in a middle class fantasy world if you think other wise.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
